channel.title: Fletching and Smithing Lag You Out
channel.description: I'm using TorvaPkz source and the same thing happens to both skills when you try to train them. You lag completely out to the login screen. When you log in your ore will be smelted/smithed or your arrow shafts/shortbow/longbow would be crafted. Does anyone know why this is happening? I would really appreciate any help from anyone. Thanks.

item.title: Fletching and Smithing Lag You Out
item.dc:creator: @Silico Silico
item.description:
@Silico wrote:

Loveandpower:

what he means to say is check the id’s on the interface itself. You may be clicking id’s that are wrong on one side or another.

Ohh… How might I fix that?

Read full topic
item.source: Fletching and Smithing Lag You Out

item.title: Fletching and Smithing Lag You Out
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

The interfaces that pop-up when you train the skill are probably wrong, and in result, are causing you to lag out.

Read full topic
